name: The Purple Orbs
description:
What would happen if magic orbs, capable of distorting space-time, were knocked over by a curious rat inside a small library?

Prepare the wand. Help Gwen to collect all the orbs and face the dangerous rooms created by these powerful magic spheres.

Gameplay:

Collect all the orbs to reveal the room key and escape.

Shoot magic or create traps(magic cloud/holes) to overcome enemies and obstacles.

Info:

Engine: RPG Maker Vx Ace

No need RTP.

Length: 15-45 minutes

Genres: action/arcade

Have a bug report or suggestions? Feel free to leave a comment below.
